page.title: 10RECREATION IN SLOUGH
page.content: Although Slough is a built -up area it has many recreational facilities.In Lascelles Park there are a couple of cricket pitches and many tennis courts.In Upton Park there are many cricket pitches and there is often a fair or circus there.There is also Montem sports centre which has an Olympic sized swimming pool. There are more than 20 parks and recreation grounds where people can walk and play games. There is a BMX track by the motorway. this is newly built and already very popular. In Slough High street there is sometimes an artificial skating rink and there are small roundabouts in the shoppin centre.
